Airtek Claw.description: The claw of a female Airtek, diffiuclt to acquire due to their dwindling numbers.

Begonea.description: A flower often used to deter potential suitors, due to it's assaulting fragrance.

Dobberchu Tongue.description: The tongue of a dobberchu, harvested before puberty, when their adult fangs grow in.

Foxglove.description: A versatile flower, with many uses.

Tuathaw Ear.description: The ear of a tuathaw, must be mature when the ear is harvested. Often used as a substitute for Ballyhooves

Herbdew.description: An herb which produces more water than it collects, though has strict botanical needs, preventing it from being more commonly useful.

Glasdig Horn.description: Rejuvenates ones inner such and such and so on

Mandrake.description: A defense mechanism Sinsircranns create, primarily to protect their root systems.

Merrow Heart.description: The heart of a Merrow, a rare ingredient owing to it's difficulty to obtain.

Muckshroom.description: A breed of mushroom which only grows in swamps near, though never directly touching, decaying corpses.

Ollifeist Tentacle.description: The tentacle of a male Ollifeist, it's far smaller than the female of the species, and it does not carry the toxens of it's mate.

Phomarian Hand.description: A hand of a phomarian, can often be found in prisons, barracks, and occasionally markets.

Silver Silin.description: Technically two plants, the silin is a breed of flower, and there is a species of moth which coats the flower in silver.

Tendroot.description: The root of a Sinsircrann, must be harvested while the rest of the tree lives.
